name: agonizingly
content:

in a way that causes extreme physical or mental pain: My knee was agonizingly painful. Agonizingly hard decisions must be made.
extremely, in a way that is annoying or upsetting: Twice he's come agonizingly close to winning the race. This is an agonizingly slow WiFi connection. See
agonizing
